display_long_description:
# Prepare to Enter Blackgate Station

A zero-gravity multiplayer horror game where every player has a unique role to play, inspired by Dead by Daylight and Echo Arena. **1-4 Engineers** are pit against an evolving **Alien** specimen controlled by another **player**. 

Free to play for all Engineers. Purchasing the full game DLC unlocks the ability to play as the Alien, earn Glory, Level Up, & customize your space suit.

[media] 

[media]
As an engineer, you and your team are sent to repair **BlackGate** station. Your mission is clear: restore **crucial systems**, unlock the **Armory**, and most importantly—stay alive. Each engineer plays a crucial role in their team's survival. 
[media]
Navigating the station isn’t easy. Using your thrusters and environment, you’ll need to push and pull your way through zero gravity, watching your back at every turn. 
[media]
The Alien begins inside the nest deep within the ship, working its way towards its prey. As the specimen, your goal is simple but deadly. You start in a weak, larval form—but quickly will gain the ability to evolve and flip the script.
[media]
Once you **evolve**, you unlock new abilities—becoming a lethal monster capable of taking on the engineers head-to-head, or luring them into debilitating traps. 
[media]

If the Engineers arm themselves, the tables could turn. In **BlackGate**, the clock is always ticking. Will the engineers work together to repair the station and take down the alien, or will the specimen evolve into an unstoppable force and claim victory? 

**© 2025 Megaverse LLC, a Fun Train® company.**

# Prepare to Enter Blackgate Station

A zero-gravity multiplayer horror game where every player has a unique role to play, inspired by Dead by Daylight and Echo Arena. **1-4 Engineers** are pit against an evolving **Alien** specimen controlled by another **player**. 

Free to play for all Engineers. Purchasing the full game DLC unlocks the ability to play as the Alien, earn Glory, Level Up, & customize your space suit.
